value: , a Capri personality, €5, open daily 9:00-5:00  The Villa is the life work of Axel Munthe who restored the ancient villa and built up his collection of antiquities in the Villa.  To really enjoy this gem get yourself a copy of "the Story of San Michele" by Axel Munthe.  It is a mystical and wondrous story that will be reread many times.
has a beautiful tiled floor depiction of Adam & Eve, €1, open daily 9:00-4:45, in town centre.

in a courtyard near the Tourist Information office, is a large, painted model of the island. Avoid it between 2:00 & 3:00, when cruise ship crowds deluge it, on Via G. Orlandi, €3, open daily 9:00-7:30, closed November to march. Telephone: 081-837-1169.

goes up to the 1,900 ft. high summit of Mt. Solaro, with a commanding view at the top of the entire Naples bay. It takes 15 minutes up or down, €9 round-trip, €7 one way (you can hike for 40 minutes down from the summit), open daily in summer 9:30-5:00, last run down at 5:30, November to march last run at 3:30.
, reached by bus from Anacapri (2 an hour) is a great place to enjoy the sunset, along with its beach pool, and restaurants.
content=The office is on the pedestrian street near Piazza Vittorio, open Monday to Saturday 9:00-3:00, closed Sunday, often closed November to Easter.

There are many roadside vendors and small restaurants.
